scripts.dev:all: bun x concurrently "bun dev:frontend" "bun dev:backend" "bun dev:worker"
scripts.start:all: bun x concurrently "bun start:frontend" "bun start:backend" "bun start:worker"
scripts.build:frontend: bun run --cwd packages/shared build && bun run --cwd packages/frontend build
scripts.build:backend: bun run --cwd packages/shared build && bun run --cwd packages/backend build
scripts.build:worker: bun run --cwd packages/shared build && bun run --cwd packages/worker build
scripts.build:all: bun run --cwd packages/shared build && bun --workspaces run build
